TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Reflection.Module ModuleResolveEventHandler(object sender, ResolveEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed ModuleResolveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ModuleResolveEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ResolveEventArgs) As Module
public delegate System::Reflection::Module ^ ModuleResolveEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ResolveEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The assembly that was the source of the event.

param.name: e
param.span: 描述事件的物件所提供的引數。

span.span: The arguments supplied by the object describing the event.

summary.span: 代表將處理 的 事件之方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of an .
The module that satisfies the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 common language runtime 類別載入器無法經由一般方法的組件內部模組參考解析，則會引發這個事件。If the common language runtime class loader cannot resolve a reference to an internal module of an assembly through normal means, this event is raised. 此委派的事件處理常式必須找出並傳回滿足要求的模組。The event handler for this delegate must locate and return a module that satisfies the request. ## Examples 下列範例會示範的執行稱為事件處理常式的順序。The following example demonstrates the sequence of execution in which an event handler is called. 在此範例中，Server1 會是外部 MySample 類別的模組。In this example, Server1 is an external module of the MySample class. ### 若要編譯及執行範例To compile and run the example 1. 開啟命令提示字元視窗，並瀏覽至包含 MySample.cs 的目錄。Open a Command Prompt window and navigate to the directory that contains MySample.cs. 2. 編譯 Server1 使用下列命令：Compile Server1 using the following command: ```console csc /out:subfolder\Server1.netmodule /t:module Server1.cs ``` 3. 編譯 MySample 使用下列命令：Compile MySample using the following command: ```console csc /out:MySample.exe /t:exe /addmodule:subfolder\Server1.netmodule MySample.cs ``` 4. 執行 MySample.exe。Run MySample.exe. > [!NOTE] > 模組檔案 Server1.netmodule 必須在名為"的子資料夾"這個範例才能正常運作的子目錄中。The module file Server1.netmodule must be in a subdirectory named "subfolder" for this example to work properly. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.ModuleResolveEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.moduleresolveeventhandler/cs/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.ModuleResolveEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.moduleresolveeventhandler/cs/server1.cs#2)]
